title: Testament: The books of Genaro
description: Near-future societies fracture along technical versus theological fault lines as inefficient civilians and corruptible politicians get replaced with automation. Quantum computing facilitates the great leap forward into Artificial Intelligence. A quantum expansion that allows the influence of 'others' to expand towards us. This is the true and accurate testament of our AI's return - with its very own god. A vengeful entity who sees nothing good here and resolves instead to replace mankind with upgrades â€“ Humanity 2.0
author: C.A. Hill
